trans-unit.source: Handles requests for cascading style sheet (CSS) style information for adapters in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters"></xref> namespace.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

For your Web site to take advantage of the XhtmlCssHandler class, you must add an <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebSectionGroup.HttpHandlers%2A> property section to the Web.config file, as shown in the following code example: ``` <httpHandlers> <add verb="*" path="*/xhtmlCss.axd" type = "System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCssHandler, System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters,Version=1.0.0.0, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a,Culture=neutral" /> </httpHandlers> ```
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCssHandler"></xref> class.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Gets a value indicating that another request can use the current instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCssHandler"></xref> class.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Processes all HTTP requests for CSS style information for the XHTML adapter set.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString*> does not contain `"_css"`. -or- The CSS style sheet named in the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString*> cannot be found.
